<a id="InputEventWithModifiers"></a>

# InputEventWithModifiers

**Inherits:** [InputEventFromWindow](InputEventFromWindow.md) **\<** [InputEvent](InputEvent.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [InputEventGesture](InputEventGesture.md), [InputEventKey](InputEventKey.md), [InputEventMouse](InputEventMouse.md)

Abstract base class for input events affected by modifier keys like :kbd:`Shift` and :kbd:`Alt`.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Stores information about mouse, keyboard, and touch gesture input events. This includes information about which modifier keys are pressed, such as :kbd:`Shift` or :kbd:`Alt`. See [Node._input()](Node.md#Node_private_method__input).

\ **Note:** Modifier keys are considered modifiers only when used in combination with another key. As a result, their corresponding member variables, such as [ctrl_pressed](InputEventWithModifiers.md#InputEventWithModifiers_property_ctrl_pressed), will return ``false`` if the key is pressed on its own.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using InputEvent](../tutorials/inputs/inputevent.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="InputEventWithModifiers_property_alt_pressed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **alt_pressed** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventWithModifiers_property_alt_pressed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_alt_pressed**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_alt_pressed**\ (\ )

State of the :kbd:`Alt` modifier.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputEventWithModifiers_property_command_or_control_autoremap"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **command_or_control_autoremap** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventWithModifiers_property_command_or_control_autoremap)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_command_or_control_autoremap**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_command_or_control_autoremap**\ (\ )

Automatically use :kbd:`Meta` (:kbd:`Cmd`) on macOS and :kbd:`Ctrl` on other platforms. If ``true``, [ctrl_pressed](InputEventWithModifiers.md#InputEventWithModifiers_property_ctrl_pressed) and [meta_pressed](InputEventWithModifiers.md#InputEventWithModifiers_property_meta_pressed) cannot be set.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputEventWithModifiers_property_ctrl_pressed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **ctrl_pressed** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventWithModifiers_property_ctrl_pressed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_ctrl_pressed**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_ctrl_pressed**\ (\ )

State of the :kbd:`Ctrl` modifier.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputEventWithModifiers_property_meta_pressed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **meta_pressed** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventWithModifiers_property_meta_pressed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_meta_pressed**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_meta_pressed**\ (\ )

State of the :kbd:`Meta` modifier. On Windows and Linux, this represents the Windows key (sometimes called "meta" or "super" on Linux). On macOS, this represents the Command key.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputEventWithModifiers_property_shift_pressed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **shift_pressed** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventWithModifiers_property_shift_pressed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_shift_pressed**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_shift_pressed**\ (\ )

State of the :kbd:`Shift` modifier.

## Method Descriptions

<a id="InputEventWithModifiers_method_get_modifiers_mask"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

**BitField**\[[KeyModifierMask](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_KeyModifierMask)\] **get_modifiers_mask**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#InputEventWithModifiers_method_get_modifiers_mask)

Returns the keycode combination of modifier keys.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputEventWithModifiers_method_is_command_or_control_pressed"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_command_or_control_pressed**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#InputEventWithModifiers_method_is_command_or_control_pressed)

On macOS, returns ``true`` if :kbd:`Meta` (:kbd:`Cmd`) is pressed.

On other platforms, returns ``true`` if :kbd:`Ctrl` is pressed.
